ryad.games.ergoengine
Class BaseObject

java.lang.Object
  ryad.games.ergoengine.BaseObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameObject
public abstract class BaseObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActionListener

Basic game object class. Serves as a container for components and contains all of the properties that ALL of our game objects are going to need.

Author:
Jason Welch

eventCallback

public void eventCallback(ActionEvent event)
Handles incoming events... Our objects can override this and prevent components from receiving the event... or they can modify the event, or they can ignore it altogether. Typically this will be called by the object manager to send it system wide events such as GameOver, PlayerDeath, etc. Other objects can even call this such as triggers.

Specified by:
eventCallback in interface ActionListener
Parameters:
event -
